name: upi_restoran
description: Kod kloniranja projekta, napravite ```.env``` u root-u projekta po uzoru na ```.env.example```.

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "blue,green" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install-all: concurrently --names "ROOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" --prefix-colors "cyan,blue,green" "npm install" "npm install --prefix backend" "npm install --prefix frontend"
